mapper.insert: insert into member(mb_no, mb_id, mb_password, mb_name, mb_nick, mb_addr, mb_pno) values (#{id}, #{email}, #{password}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{address}, #{phoNo})
mapper.update: update member set name = #{updateParam.name}, password = #{updateParam.password}, pho_no = #{updateParam.phoNo}, email = #{updateParam.email}, nick_name = #{updateParam.nickName} where id = #{id}
